/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with life, with cars and buses navigating their way through the roads. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
